events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the software developer position.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
During the initial screening call, we discussed your experience with software development and your technical skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and sharing additional details about your recent engineering projects.
Your technical interview with our senior developer has been scheduled for next Wednesday at 3 PM.
The technical interview went well, and the interviewers were impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
We have scheduled your HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps in the hiring process.
Your HR interview was successful, and we appreciate your openness in sharing your expectations and values.
We are pleased to propose you a formal offer for the software engineer position including competitive compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer and your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
We are excited to confirm that you have accepted the offer and look forward to having you on board soon.
Your onboarding process has started, and we have scheduled your orientation and initial setup sessions.
Congratulations on successfully completing the hiring process; your position as software engineer is now officially closed.
